name: MASSACHUSETTS BIOTECHNOLOGY COUNCIL
description: Trade association dedicated to advancing research
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Support legislation to strengthen U.S. Patent System
Meetings regarding issues associated with the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act's and alternative legislation's impact on the biotechnology industry, including issues related to biosimilars,
Meetings regarding proposed changes to Medicare Part B and Medicare Part D reimbursement that negatively impact patient access to innovative therapies.
Support legislation to fund the National Institutes of Health for Fiscal Year 2019
Monitor health and tax legislation ptertaining to bioltechnology industry.
